short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to add any Tumblr thread to your RPThreadTracker account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to quickly add new Tumblr threads to an account on RPThreadTracker.com. While on any Tumblr post page, just click the extension icon to get a pop-up window of the tracker's "Add Thread" screen, with the post ID and blog already in place. Add your thread, close the window, and carry on!
